General.Name: Jinxiandai Information Industry Co
General.Description: JinXianDai Information Industry Co.,Ltd. engages in development, service and sales of digital solutions and application software development platform in China. The company provides urban rail infrastructure inspection and monitoring platform, petrochemical enterprise safety management information system, and professional digital and information solutions, as well as develops low-code development platform product, knowledge graph visualization development platform, and intelligent operation and maintenance platform. It also provides software, hardware, project management engineer, database application, and business etiquette training; designs, develops, and sells computer software, hardware, auxiliary, network, electronic instruments, and office automation equipment; and designs and constructs computer networks. In addition, the company offers computer system integration and general wiring, retail, technical, and security engineering, technical exchange, technology transfer and promotion; information system operation, maintenance, and integration; and network technology, software outsourcing, artificial intelligence application, network and information security, information technology consulting, data processing and storage, and other information technology and application services. Further, it operates private vocational skills training institutions; purchases agricultural production materials; and provides special safety technical training, cultural and artistic exchange, housekeeping, health consulting, human resources, safety and education consulting, labor, and business management consulting services, as well as services for studying abroad. JinXianDai Information Industry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Jinan, China.
